trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gir dataene for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader?displayProperty=fullName> event lets you customize (or owner-draw) the appearance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control in the details view.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader?displayProperty=fullName>hendelsen kan du tilpasse (eller eieren draw) utseendet til en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollen i detaljvisningen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised by a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control when its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to `true` and its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader?displayProperty=fullName>denne hendelsen oppstår ved en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollerer når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A?displayProperty=fullName>er satt til `true` og den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs passed to the event handler contains information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> to draw and also provides methods to help you draw the header.
trans-unit.target: DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs sendt til hendelsesbehandlingen inneholder informasjon om den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>til å tegne og gir deg også metoder for å hjelpe deg med å tegne hodet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.Header%2A> property to retrieve information about the column header to draw.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.Header%2A>til å hente informasjon om kolonneoverskriften for å tegne.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.Header%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.Graphics%2A> property to do the actual drawing within the area specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.Bounds%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.Graphics%2A>til å utføre den faktiske tegningen innenfor området som er angitt av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.Bounds%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.Bounds%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.Graphics%2A>

trans-unit.source: To draw standard <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> elements that do not need customization, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.DrawText%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Til å tegne standard <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>elementer som ikke krever tilpasning, bruker du <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.DrawText%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.DrawText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.DrawDefault%2A> property when you want the operating system to draw the subitem.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.DrawDefault%2A>Når du ønsker operativsystem for å tegne subitem.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.DrawDefault%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you want to customize only specific headers.
trans-unit.target: Dette er nyttig når du ønsker å tilpasse bare bestemte overskrifter.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To avoid issues with graphics flickering when owner drawing, override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DoubleBuffered%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Å unngå problemer med grafikk flimring overstyres tegning er eieren av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollere og angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DoubleBuffered%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DoubleBuffered%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: This feature is available only on Windows XP and the Windows Server 2003 family when your application calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne funksjonen er bare tilgjengelig på Windows XP og Windows Server 2003 familien når programmet kaller den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> surface on which to draw.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> surface som tegn.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> within which to draw.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som brukes til å tegne.

trans-unit.source: The index of the header's column within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen i overskriften kolonne i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A?displayProperty=fullName> samling.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"></xref> representing the header to draw.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"> </xref> som representerer overskriften til å tegne.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates"></xref> values indicating the current state of the column header.
trans-unit.target: En bitvis kombinasjon av <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates"> </xref> verdier som angir gjeldende status for kolonneoverskriften.

trans-unit.source: The foreground <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> of the header.
trans-unit.target: Forgrunnen <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> i hodet.

trans-unit.source: The background <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> of the header.
trans-unit.target: Bakgrunnen <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> i hodet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> used for the header text.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> brukes for toppteksten.

trans-unit.source: Gets the background color of the header.
trans-unit.target: Henter bakgrunnsfargen for hodet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> representing the background color of the header.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> som representerer bakgrunnsfargen for hodet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the size and location of the column header to draw.
trans-unit.target: Henter størrelsen og plasseringen av kolonneoverskriften for å tegne.

trans-unit.source: The location specified by this property is relative to the upper-left corner of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Plasseringen angitt av denne egenskapen er i forhold til det øvre venstre hjørnet av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the bounds of the column header.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som representerer grensene for kolonneoverskriften.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"></xref> representing the header to draw.
trans-unit.target: Henter indeksen for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"> </xref> som representerer overskriften til å tegne.

trans-unit.source: The index of the column header within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for kolonneoverskriften i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A?displayProperty=fullName> samling.

trans-unit.source: Draws the background of the column header.
trans-unit.target: Tegner bakgrunn for kolonneoverskriften.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to draw the standard background for the column header.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne metoden til å tegne standardbakgrunn for kolonneoverskriften.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the column header should be drawn by the operating system instead of owner-drawn.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om kolonneoverskriften skal tegnes operativsystemet i stedet for eieren tegnes.

trans-unit.source: Use this property when handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader?displayProperty=fullName> event for headers that you do not want to customize.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen når behandling av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader?displayProperty=fullName>hendelse for hodet som du ikke vil tilpasse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you set this property to `true`, the header will be drawn as usual.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du setter denne egenskapen til `true`, overskriften skal tegnes som vanlig.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the header should be drawn by the operating system; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis overskriften skal tegnes av operativsystemet. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Draws the column header text using the default formatting.
trans-unit.target: Tegner kolonnen toppteksten ved hjelp av standard formatering.

trans-unit.source: Use this method when you do not need to customize the appearance of the header text.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne metoden hvis du ikke trenger å tilpasse utseendet til toppteksten.

trans-unit.source: Draws the column header text, formatting it with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Tegner kolonne-toppteksten formatering med angitt <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Use this method when you do not need to customize the appearance of the header text.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne metoden hvis du ikke trenger å tilpasse utseendet til toppteksten.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> values specified in the `flags` parameter let you provide formatting properties for the header, such as text alignment.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags>verdiene i den `flags` parameteren lar deg angi formatering egenskaper for topptekst, for eksempel tekstjustering.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: En bitvis kombinasjon av <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets the font used to draw the column header text.
trans-unit.target: Henter skriften som brukes til å tegne toppteksten for kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> representing the font of the header text.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> som representerer skriften på toppteksten.

trans-unit.source: Gets the foreground color of the header.
trans-unit.target: Henter forgrunnsfargen på hodet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> representing the foreground color of the header.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> som representerer forgrunnsfargen på hodet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the column header.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> brukes til å tegne kolonneoverskriften.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class provides properties and methods useful for drawing on the display device.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>klassen gir egenskaper og metoder som er nyttige for å tegne på visningsenheten.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the column header.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> brukes til å tegne kolonneoverskriften.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"></xref> representing the column header to draw.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"> </xref> som representerer kolonneoverskriften for å tegne.

trans-unit.source: This property is useful when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.State%2A> property does not provide adequate information to meet your needs.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er nyttig når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.State%2A>egenskapen inneholder ikke tilstrekkelig informasjon etter dine behov.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.State%2A> property provides only basic state information that you can use, for example, to determine whether the mouse is over the column header.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.State%2A>egenskapen gir bare grunnleggende informasjon om du kan for eksempel bruke til å finne ut om musen er over kolonneoverskriften.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Header property, on the other hand, allows you to access all members of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> representing the header.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen hodet derimot, får du tilgang til alle medlemmer av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>som representerer hodet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"></xref> representing the column header.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"> </xref> som representerer kolonneoverskriften.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current state of the column header.
trans-unit.target: Henter gjeldende status for kolonneoverskriften.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to determine whether the mouse pointer is over the header or whether the user has clicked the header.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å fastsette om musepekeren holdes over overskriften, eller brukeren har trykket hodet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates> values for these states are <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates>Verdier for disse tilstandene er <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates"></xref> values indicating the current state of the column header.
trans-unit.target: En bitvis kombinasjon av <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates"> </xref> verdier som angir gjeldende status for kolonneoverskriften.
